text: avarkk nāṁ cila kūṭṭukāre ērpeṭutti keāṭuttu. enniṭṭ ā kūṭṭāḷikaḷ avarkk taṅṅaḷuṭe mumpiluḷḷatuṁ pinniluḷḷatuṁ alaṅkr̥tamāyi tēānniccu. jinnukaḷil ninnuṁ manuṣyaril ninnuṁ avarkk mump kaḻiññupēāyiṭṭuḷḷa samudāyaṅṅaḷuṭe kūṭṭattil ivaruṭe mēluṁ (śikṣayepaṟṟiyuḷḷa) prakhyāpanaṁ sthirappeṭukayuṇṭāyi. tīrccayāyuṁ avar naṣṭaṁ paṟṟiyavarāyirunnu
